extDescription.message: Exportiert alle Cookies in einem Netscape HTTP Cookie File, das von curl, wget, youtube-dl usw. genutzt wird.
extDescription.description: Short description of the extension to be displayed in the UI and on AMO

buttonDescription.description: Tooltip of the browser toolbar icon.

popupSitesAll.description: Popup option text for exporting all cookies

popupSitesCurrent.description: Popup option text for exporting cookies only from the current site

popupSitesContainerAll.description: Popup option text for exporting all cookies from the current container

popupSitesContainerCurrent.description: Popup option text for exporting cookies only from the current site and current container
